name: CUTE METAL SHOWDOWN: ULTRA POWER FLUFFY ANNIHILATION
name_original: CUTE METAL SHOWDOWN: ULTRA POWER FLUFFY ANNIHILATION
description:
Are you ready for Cute Animals? Are you ready for Metal?? Are you ready to Fight???

Then you are ready for:

Call your friends, choose your favorite animal, and push them out of the arena in 3 different game modes at this extremely fun party game for 2-4 players!
